hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever leaves behind money, it is for his heirs, and whoever leaves behind a debt for children, I am nearer to the believers.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تَرَكَ دَيْنًا أَوْ ضَيَاعًا فَعَلَى اللَّهِ وَعَلَى رَسُولِهِ
chapter.eng-name: If A Man Leaves Behind A Debt Or Children, Then Allah (SWT) And His Messenger Are Respon
